title: Executioner's axe
data:
{{version031}} {{weapon |name = Executioner's axe |cost = ? |skill = Axes |damage = 18 |accuracy = -6 |basedelay = 19 (180%) |mindelay = 7 at skill 24 |hands = 2H |size = Large |damtype = Chopping |ranged = No |acquirement = 2 }} {{flavour|A fearsome weapon covered in dried blood and crude engravings of torture and death, bearing an enormous axehead.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the [[Axes]] category. It is a two handed weapon.}} The '''executioner's axe''' is a massive two-handed weapon. It is the strongest axe, and one of the strongest weapons in the game. Unfortunately, they are quite rare, and take a high amount of skill to reach mindelay. Like all axes, this weapon allows the player to [[cleave]]. ==Strategy== Executioner's axes aren't common weapons. Other than [[Trog]] and [[Okawaru]] gifts, they can occasionally be found in the [[Elven_Halls#Elf:2 - The Hall of Blades|Hall of Blades]], or in the [[Pandemonium]] (from [[list of demonspawn|demonspawn]] opponents). If you haven't found one, don't fret. A [[broad axe]] or [[battleaxe]] are still good weapons; both are capable of winning the game. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Executioner axe1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Executioner axe2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Executioner axe3.png]] |- ! || [[Unrandarts|Unrandart]]
